results.name: a(n) = 4*2^n - 9.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-2).
formula: For n >= 3, a(n) = 8<+>(n+2), where operation <+> is defined in A206853. - _Vladimir Shevelev_, Feb 17 2012
results.author: _Artur Jasinski_, Jan 29 2010
